description: Celebrate the union of love in a picturesque setting with an elegant wedding ceremony and reception.No matter the size or location, Dreamy Weddings brings dream Caribbean weddings to life, and one of our Caribbean wedding packages is guaranteed to be perfect for you. Many brides desire to have a traditional church wedding in their hometown, but some also want to take the scenery and other accommodations to the next level with a tropical island wedding, which is why we offer luxurious amenities and romantic detailing that truly make our Caribbean weddings unforgettable.

package_details.premium: VIP sThis package is ideal for bride and groom  who is travelling on a cruise line which will dock at any of our 13 destination.This Couple can be travelling allone or with a group.
